name: Nexmo Click to Call
description: Example of a Click to Call app

MY_NUMBER.description: The phone number you want callers to reach you on

MY_LVN.description: The number you have rented from Nexmo to use as the CallerID

APP_ID.description: The UUID of your Nexmo voice applicaiton

PRIVATE_KEY.description: The private key that was generated when you created the nexmo voice application
